title: The Sims 1 Complete Collection repack Mr DJ
description:
The Sims 1: The Complete Collection Repack by Mr DJ (Me)

Repack features:
- Interface languages is English ;
- Precracked - install and play
- Install Time - 4 minutes [Quad core]
- Final Size: 3.42gb
- Registry: Yes
- Operating System: Win Xp SP2,Win Vista,Win 7,Win 8,Win 8.1 (both 32bit and 64bit)

Contents:
The Sims
The Sims: Livin' Large
The Sims: House Party
The Sims: Hot Date
The Sims: Vacation
The Sims: Unleashed (Pets)
The Sims: Superstar
The Sims: Makin' Magic

This is Ideal for you if you have a low specification rig or if you are a sims fanatic. 

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

DISABLE YOUR ANTIVIRUS BEFORE RUNNING SETUP (IMPORTANT) as the antivirus will mark 'setup' as a suspicious file,, making it unable to launch setup or may run it but with some glitches,, same for uninstall.....(For avast users: Disable DeepScreen in antivirus settings)...

After running setup,, select the necessary software (direct x and visual c++ provided in Redist folder),, install as usual,, play the game from desktop shortcut....

IF YOU LIKE THE REPACK,,GIVE FEEDBACK AND SEED.......

LIKE THE GAME,, BUY IT AND SUPPORT THE DEVELOPERS.......
